Detailed Description

template<typename T, DWORD dwOffset>
class COffsetAccessor< T, dwOffset >

Offers a generic way to interact with FSUIPC offsets.

See also:
COffsetAccessor::getValue

COffsetAccessor::setValue

CConnector

Template Parameters:
T the type of the offset value (must respect the offset alignment).
dwOffset the FSUIPC internal address of the offset.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

COffsetAccessor ( float  fMultiple = 1.0f  )  [inline]

Constructor with optionnal multiplier parameter.

Constructor

Parameters:
fMultiple the multiplier which transform data from and to FSUIPC.

Member Function Documentation

bool dataHasChanged (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Test if data has changed.

Test if the data has changed since the last update.

See also:
CAbstractOffsetFamily::update
Returns:
true if data has changed, false otherwise.

Implements CAbstractOffsetData.

DWORD fillAsRawData ( BYTE *  buffer  )  const [inline, virtual]

Fills the buffer with the local value of the offset.

Remarks:
If you want to fil the the buffer with the least FSUIPC value you have to call the update method.
Parameters:
buffer the buffer to fill with local offset value.
Returns:
the number of written bytes.

Implements CAbstractOffsetData.

T getValue (  )  const [inline]

Get the offset value from FSUIPC.

Get the offset value from FSUIPC and transform it with the multiplier before return it.

Returns:
the value of the offset after applying the multiplier.

void setValue ( const T &  newValue  )  [inline]

Set the offset value to FSUIPC.

Set the offset value to FSUIPC after transforming it with the multiplier. The call to this function updates the local value.

See also:
COffsetAccessor::update
Parameters:
newValue the new offset value to set.

void setValueFromRawData ( const BYTE *  buffer  )  [inline, virtual]

Set the offset value with the data contained in the buffer.

Note:
This method use the setValue method.
Parameters:
buffer the buffer from which the data is read.

Implements CAbstractOffsetData.

DWORD sizeInBytes (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Returns the size in byte of the offset value.

Returns:
the size in bytes of the offset value.

Implements CAbstractOffsetData.

void update (  )  [inline, virtual]

Update the local offset value from FSUIPC.

Remarks:
This function must be call every time you want to refresh the local value of the offset from FSUIPC.

Implements CAbstractOffsetData.
